  • Cell Explorer on GitHub
  1. Graphical interface
  2. Preferences

Allows the user to customize the cell Explorer. Preferences are located in CellExplorer_Preferences.m. Below the preferences and options are described in details.

*** Display settings

  1. customCellPlotIn1-6 : incomplete list: ‘Single waveform’,’All waveforms’,’All waveforms (image)’,’Single raw waveform’,’All raw waveforms’,’Single ACG’,’All ACGs’,’All ACGs (image)’,’CCGs (image)’,’Sharp wave-ripple’

  2. ACG_type : [‘Normal’ (100ms), ‘Wide’ (1s), ‘Narrow’ (30ms)]
  3. monoSynDispIn: [‘None’, ‘Selected’, ‘All’]
  4. plotCountIn : [‘GUI 1+3’,’GUI 2+3’,’GUI 3+3’,’GUI 3+4’,’GUI 3+5’,’GUI 3+6’]
  5. metricsTableType : [‘Metrics’,’Cells’,’None’]
  6. plotWaveformMetrics : [0,1]
  7. dispLegend : [0,1] *** Initial data displayed in the customPlot
  8. plotXdata : ‘firingRate’
  9. plotYdata : ‘peakVoltage’
  10. plotZdata : ‘troughToPeak’

% Autosave settings UI.settings.autoSaveFrequency : 6 UI.settings.autoSaveVarName : ‘cell_metrics’

*** Cell type classification definitions

  1. cellTypes: {‘Unknown’, ‘Pyramidal Cell 1’, ‘Pyramidal Cell 2’, ‘Pyramidal Cell 3’, ‘Narrow Interneuron’, ‘Wide Interneuron’};
  2. deepSuperficial: {‘Unknown’, ‘Cortical’, ‘Deep’, ‘Superficial’};

*** Cell type classification colors

  1. cellTypeColors : [ [.5,.5,.5];[.2,.2,.8];[.2,.8,.2];[0.2,0.8,0.8];[.8,.2,.2];[0.8,0.2,0.8] ];

*** Fields used to define the tSNE space

  1. tSNE_calcWideAcg : boolean
  2. tSNE_calcNarrowAcg : boolean
  3. tSNE_calcFiltWaveform : boolean
  4. tSNE_calcRawWaveform : boolean

*** List of fields to use in the general tSNE representation

  1. tSNE_metrics : {‘FiringRate’, ‘ThetaModulationIndex’, ‘BurstIndex_Mizuseki2012’, ‘TroughToPeak’, ‘AB_ratio’, ‘BurstIndex_Royer2012’, ‘ACG_tau_rise’, ‘ACG_tau_burst’, ‘ACG_h’, ‘ACG_tau_decay’, ‘CV2’, ‘BurstIndex_Doublets’, ‘ThetaPhaseTrough’, ‘ThetaEntrainment’, ‘derivative_TroughtoPeak’};
  2. tSNE_dDistanceMetric : default ‘seuclidean’

*** Highlighting excitatory and inhibitory cells

  1. displayInhibitory = boolean
  2. displayExcitatory = boolean

% Firing rate map setting showHeatmap : boolean showLegend : boolean showHeatmapColorbar : boolean
